qas.question: Where is the UNESCO World Heritage Site?
Where does Bern rank for top cities for the best quality of life?
When did the centre of Bern become the UNESCO World Heritage Site?

context: In <a2_0>1983<a2_0/> the historic old town in the <a0_0>centre of Bern<a0_0/> became a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Bern is ranked among the world’s <a1_0>top ten<a1_0/> cities for the best quality of life (2010).
